revised_title: Isomeric Interchange in Benzenediazonium Hydroxides: The Transformation of s-Trichloro- and s-Tribromo-Benzenediazonium Hydroxides
tldr: The authors investigate the isomeric change in benzene derivatives, specifically the interchange of halogen and hydroxyl in benzenediazonium hydroxides. They study the transformation of s-trichloro- and s-tribromo-benzenediazonium hydroxides into hydroxybenzene derivatives, providing insights into the mechanisms of intramolecular change and the role of catalysts in these reactions.
